record.id: field.name="filename" and file.name="validity" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: filename
record.file.name: validity

brief.brief: The name of the logical file associated with the Validity record.

detail.detail: The application validity.summarize validates this name against the Dbdict table every time you add or update a record in this table.
This field, in combination with the Field Name and Sequence fields, uniquely identifies the validity record.
If this field is empty (NULL) at add or update time, the validation routine automatically copies the contents of the first element in the Files/Forms array to this field.
